addPools(address,uint24[]).details: only callable by owner of the vault

blacklistRouters(address,address[]).details: only callable by owner of the vault

closeTerm(address,address,address,addres.details: only vault owner can call it. Client will pay emoluments.

params.newManager_: new manager of the Arrakis V2 vault.
params.newOwner_: new owner of the Arrakis V2 vault.

increaseLiquidity((address,uint256,uint2.details: only vault owner can call it.

params.increaseBalance_: contain all data to increase vault allocations.

params.setup_: contains all data to create ArrakisV2 vault, creates a term btw client and PALM automated management.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removePools(address,address[]).details: only callable by owner of the vault

renewTerm(address).details: only vault owner can call it.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDelegate(address,address).details: only callable by owner of vault

params.delegate_: delegated strategy setter of Arrakis V2 vault

setVaultData(address,bytes).details: only callable by delegate of the vault by default or otherwise owner

params.data_: metadata to use during market making

setVaultStratByName(address,string).details: only callable by delegate of the vault by default or otherwise owner

params.strat_: strategy to apply during market making

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.index: index on the list of vaults

returns._0: address of the Arrakis Vault V2

whitelistRouters(address,address[]).details: only callable by owner of the vault

withdrawVaultBalance(address,uint256,add.details: only callable by owner of vault

params.amount_: amount of balance that receiver will get back
params.to_: address of the receiver of balance

addPools(address,uint24[]).notice: for adding new Pools on Arrakis V2 vault

blacklistRouters(address,address[]).notice: for blacklist routers on Arrakis V2 vault

closeTerm(address,address,address,addres.notice: closes term btw PALM and client.

increaseLiquidity((address,uint256,uint2.notice: increases tokens allocation on client ArrakisV2 PALM vault.

openTerm((uint24[],address,address,addre.notice: does neccesary step to initialize PALM market making.

removePools(address,address[]).notice: for removing Pools on Arrakis V2 vault

renewTerm(address).notice: renews term btw PALMManager and client on ArrakisV2 PALM vault

setDelegate(address,address).notice: set delegate for managing strategy of Arrakis V2 vault

setVaultData(address,bytes).notice: set Arrakis V2 vault meta data

whitelistRouters(address,address[]).notice: for whitelisting routers on Arrakis V2 vault

userdoc.notice: Smart contract creating market making terms btw client and Arrakis Finance
